name: ViewSonicLampFreeSmartTheater
0:
”Alexa, turn on the projector”
”Alexa, set the volume of projector to thirty five”
”Alexa, change the projector to HDMI 1 input”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
ViewSonic Lamp Free Smart Theater can control projector via voice commands, such as volume, power and source.

Users are required to bind vRemote Android or iOS app to their vRemote accounts when they use ViewSonic Lamp Free Smart Theater at the first time. Meanwhile the vRemote account must have been added at least one smart device.

In order to obtain better control performance, please specify a clear name for projector in vRemote APP like “my projector”, “the projector” and “projector”.

Smart Home Skill Voice Commands:
Alexa, turn on [device]
Alexa, turn off [device]
Alexa, Set the volume of [device] to [0~50] 
Alexa, mute [device]
Alexa, unmute [device]
Alexa. Change the [device] to HDMI[1/2/3/4] input
Alexa, set the [device] to HDMI[1/2/3/4] input
Alexa, set the [device] to USB input
Alexa, set the [device] to computer input
Alexa, set the [device] to home page
Alexa, set the [device] to auto focus

Note: Please turn on "Standby Voice Control" in Basic Setting, if you want to use voice to turn on or turn off the projector.
